name: Don't Hit ME!!
description:
Our game will have a variety of gameplay from the escape of the bar escape to other games so that the bar can continue to survive

You will find a lot of old games in a unique indie style since the game was released.

Let's start with Break Out with a particularly familiar bounce pattern. This bouncing ball bounces.

Seeing the first major incident that rose up against the bar itself. to not succumb to fate any longer

There are some hints that can keep players going after a sudden game change.

 

Of course, there will be many more surprises to you through the story and escape of A tumultuous bar that wants to live. Follow the story of this bar through the game!

P.S. Everything in this game happens on purpose, even if it doesn't happen accidentally. Have fun with the game
